New Records: Manny Machado tied Nate Colbert's Padres' all-time home run record with 163
Key Match Events: Machado homered twice, once in the first inning and again in the eighth
Error by Giants' Jurickson Profar led to two runs in the third inning
Machado added an RBI single in the fifth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Mike Shildt highlighted Machado's achievement as a significant milestone
Miscellaneous Highlights: Machado celebrated his home runs with a bubble sign
Game was played before a sellout crowd of 42,595
